description:
Kai enlists the help of http://anidb.net/ch109978 [Setsuna], http://anidb.net/ch109980 [Towa] and http://anidb.net/ch109979 [Moroha] to slay demons plaguing the Iyo Province.
Towa quickly sees through the ruse that it is actually http://anidb.net/ch116282 [Riku] in disguise who somehow was brought back to life.
name: Kai
